title: Observations on fevers and febrifuges. Written in French by Monsieur Spon, one of the most eminent physicians of Lyons; upon occasion of reading a book entituled, The discovery of the admirable English remedy. Now made English, by J. Berrie
author: Spon, Issac, 1647-1685.
publisher: printed for Mark Pardoe, at the black Raven in the Strand against Bedford-house,
notes: Copy includes an extra leaf inserted between E4-5.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
